translation_en: By the sky containing great stars
translation_id: Demi langit yang mempunyai gugusan bintang,

translation_en: And [by] the promised Day
translation_id: demi hari yang dijanjikan,

translation_en: And [by] the witness and what is witnessed,
translation_id: demi yang menyaksikan dan yang disaksikan,

translation_en: Cursed were the companions of the trench
translation_id: binasalah orang-orang yang membuat parit (tempat menyiksa orang mukmin)

translation_en: [Containing] the fire full of fuel,
translation_id: (yang dikobarkan) api penuh kayu bakar.

translation_en: When they were sitting near it
translation_id: Ketika (itu) mereka (hanya) duduk di sekitarnya.

arabic: وَّهُمْ عَلٰى مَا يَفْعَلُوْنَ بِالْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ شُهُوْدٌ  ۗ
transliteration_en: Wa hum 'alaa maa yaf'aloona bilmu 'mineena shuhood
transliteration_id: Wa hum ‘alā mā yaf‘alūna bil-mu'minīna syuhūd(un).
translation_en: And they, to what they were doing against the believers, were witnesses.
translation_id: Mereka menyaksikan apa yang mereka perbuat terhadap orang-orang mukmin.

arabic: وَمَا نَقَمُوْا مِنْهُمْ اِلَّآ اَنْ يُّؤْمِنُوْا بِاللّٰهِ الْعَزِيْزِ الْحَمِيْدِۙ
transliteration_en: Wa maa naqamoo minhum illaaa aiyu'minoo billaahil 'azeezil Hameed
transliteration_id: Wa mā naqamū minhum illā ay yu'minū billāhil-‘azīzil-ḥamīd(i).
translation_en: And they resented them not except because they believed in Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy,
translation_id: Tidaklah mereka menyiksa (membakar) orang-orang mukmin itu, kecuali karena mereka beriman kepada Allah Yang Maha Perkasa lagi Maha Terpuji,

arabic: الَّذِيْ لَهٗ مُلْكُ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضِ ۗوَاللّٰهُ عَلٰى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيْدٌ  ۗ
transliteration_en: Allazee lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal ard; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai 'in Shaheed
transliteration_id: Allażī lahū mulkus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), wallāhu ‘alā kulli syai'in syahīd(un).
translation_en: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And Allah, over all things, is Witness.
translation_id: yang memiliki kerajaan langit dan bumi. Allah Maha Menyaksikan segala sesuatu.

arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ فَتَنُوا الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ وَالْمُؤْمِنٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوْبُوْا فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ الْحَرِيْقِۗ
transliteration_en: Innal lazeena fatanul mu'mineena wal mu'minaati summa lam yatooboo falahum 'azaabu Jahannama wa lahum 'azaabul hareeq
transliteration_id: Innal-lażīna fatanul-mu'minīna wal-mu'mināti ṡumma lam yatūbū fa lahum ‘ażābu jahannama wa lahum ‘ażābul-ḥarīq(i).
translation_en: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of the Burning Fire.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya, orang-orang yang menimpakan cobaan (siksa) terhadap mukmin laki-laki dan perempuan, lalu mereka tidak bertobat, mereka akan mendapat azab Jahanam dan mereka akan mendapat azab (neraka) yang membakar.

arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَعَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ لَهُمْ جَنّٰتٌ تَجْرِيْ مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْاَنْهٰرُ ەۗ ذٰلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْكَبِيْرُۗ
transliteration_en: Innal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati lahum Jannaatun tajree min tahtihal anhaar; zaalikal fawzul kabeer
transliteration_id: Innal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti lahum jannātun tajrī min taḥtihal-anhār(u), żālikal-fauzul-kabīr(u).
translation_en: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great attainment.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya, orang-orang yang beriman dan mengerjakan kebajikan, mereka akan mendapat surga yang mengalir di bawahnya sungai-sungai. Itulah kemenangan yang besar.

translation_en: Indeed, the vengeance of your Lord is severe.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya azab Tuhanmu sangat keras.

translation_en: Indeed, it is He who originates [creation] and repeats.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya Dialah yang memulai (penciptaan makhluk) dan yang mengembalikan (hidup setelah mati).

translation_en: And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate,
translation_id: Dialah Yang Maha Pengampun lagi Maha Pengasih,

translation_en: Honorable Owner of the Throne,
translation_id: Pemilik ʻArasy lagi Maha Mulia,

translation_en: Effecter of what He intends.
translation_id: Maha Kuasa berbuat apa saja yang Dia kehendaki.

translation_en: Has there reached you the story of the soldiers -
translation_id: Sudahkah sampai kepadamu berita tentang bala tentara,

translation_en: [Those of] Pharaoh and Thamud?
translation_id: (yaitu bala tentara) Fir‘aun dan Samud?

translation_en: But they who disbelieve are in [persistent] denial,
translation_id: Memang orang-orang kafir (selalu) mendustakan,

translation_en: While Allah encompasses them from behind.
translation_id: padahal Allah mengepung dari belakang mereka.

translation_en: But this is an honored Qur'an
translation_id: Bahkan, (yang didustakan itu) Al-Qur’an yang mulia

translation_en: [Inscribed] in a Preserved Slate.
translation_id: yang (tersimpan) dalam (tempat) yang terjaga (Lauhulmahfuz).
